tyrelion.music
Class MusicLoader

java.lang.Object
  tyrelion.music.MusicLoader

public class MusicLoader
extends java.lang.Object

This class checks the "music" folder for its contents. It creates a list of categories and a map of the detected tracks ordered by the categories.

Author:
jahudi

Constructor Summary

          Creates an new MusicLoader an initializes the categories and music.

Constructor Detail

MusicLoader

public MusicLoader()
Creates an new MusicLoader an initializes the categories and music.

Method Detail

initCategories

public void initCategories()
Creates a list of categories for the game musics. The list is based on the directory structure of the "music" directory.

initMusic

public void initMusic()
Fills the "musicMap" with all the music files in the "music" directory ordered by categories. The categories are used as key.

scanMusic

public java.util.ArrayList<TyrelionMusic> scanMusic(java.lang.String category)
Parameters:
category - the name of the category to scan for music
Returns:
an ArrayList of TyrelionMusic objects of the specified category

getMusicMap

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<TyrelionMusic>> getMusicMap()
Returns:
the musicMap

getCategories

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCategories()
Returns:
the categories
